column4: what program should i use to transfer mp3's onto my portable usb mp3 player??
and which program to mass edit ID tags?
Amorak works with ipods, I use gtkpod on my Touch. Not sure about mass tag editing.
apt-cache search id tags editor returned these programs; eyed3, cowbell, exfalso, id3, id3ed, id3v2, kid3 and few others.
